note:
An old man who loves comics from Paleo to Golden Age #comics to now. Pulps too. A reader, not a collector.

"Just say no to Darrel Dane aka Doll Man. #$@#$ that guy."

Literature, sf, history, arts, sciences, Linux, FLOSS.

Analog artist and non-fiction writer specialized In Tang and Song China, Kamakura era Japan, with tangents into Pali, Sanskrit, and Tibetan literature. Designed modern dance environments in sound and vision long ago, poet. Lactose intolerant. Lefty scum generally.
